short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill screen with video on Plex

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zooms the video in to make it cover the entire screen and remove black bars without stretching on Plex.

1. Go to Plex
2. Play a video
3. Click the extension

Click extension again to disable.
